function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation and overcrowding in multi-family housing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and poor health outcomes","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, limit occupancy, and implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection","People":"Residents, especially vulnerable populations","Owner":"Building management, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of maintenance in aging residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of mold, pests, and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Regular inspections and maintenance, addressing infrastructure issues, and promoting cleanliness and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Building automation systems, moisture and humidity sensors, pest control measures","People":"Residents, maintenance staff, and visitors","Owner":"Building management, local government"},{"Description":"Socialist-era architectural designs and construction may not meet modern health and safety standards","Impact":"Increased risk of structural hazards, inadequate sanitation, and limited access to essential services","Mitigation":"Assessment and retrofitting of buildings, infrastructure upgrades, and compliance with current building codes","Technologies":"Building condition assessment tools, structural reinforcement materials, modern plumbing and electrical systems","People":"Residents, occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Building owners, local regulatory authorities"}]}
